events.title: Engine Upgrades
events.text: A crew member has come up with an interesting proposal. They believe that with some work, we can reconfigure our engines to be more fuel efficient. There is some risk, however, and they want to know if they should proceed.

buttons.text: Run a small-scale test first. (-5 fuel)
It's too risky. Stay the course.

events.title: Success!
events.text:
The engine modifications were a complete success! We managed to regain a significant amount of fuel.


We gain 30 fuel.

events.title: Failure
events.text:
The engine modifications seemed to be going well, but a power overload in the engine core destroyed the modifications we made. The resulting explosion caused considerable damage.


We lose 20 hull integrity.

events.title: Testing Complete
events.text: Our engineers have finished running a small-scale test, and found several problems they were able to solve. They suspect the process will be easier now.
